instances.speaker: mcrpg:alex
instances.message: Hi! Sooo this might be a bit of an odd question from a stranger but would you happen to have a quest for me?

responses.text: I was gonna ask the same thing.

instances.speaker: mcrpg:alex
instances.message: Oh well, that's alright! I kinda knew you would say that haha. Anyways, carry on!

instances.speaker: mcrpg:alex
instances.message: Oh really? Are you an adventurer too? That's so cool! Maybe we could like, team up or something?

instances.speaker: mcrpg:alex
instances.message: Aww really? But why?! Well, Never mind  I guess...

instances.speaker: mcrpg:alex
instances.message: Oh awesome! I have a feeling you and I are gonna get along just fine!
